CodeList.Name: Impact of Visual Impairment Scale Questionnaire Test Name

Description.TranslatedText: Impact of Visual Impairment Scale test name.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Impact of Visual Impairment Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how difficult did you find it to identify house numbers, street signs, etc.?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IVIS - Identify House Numbers or Street Signs

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Impact of Visual Impairment Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how difficult did you find it to read or access dials, such as on stoves, thermostats, etc.?
Impact of Visual Impairment Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how difficult did you find it to read or access personal letters or notes?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IVIS - Read or Access Personal Letters

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Impact of Visual Impairment Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how difficult did you find it to read or access printed materials, such as books, magazines, newspaper, etc.?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IVIS - Read or Access Printed Materials

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Impact of Visual Impairment Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how difficult did you find it to watch television or identify faces from a distance?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IVIS - Watch TV or Identify Faces From Distance

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Impact of Visual Impairment Scale Questionnaire Test Name
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire Impact of Visual Impairment Scale Test Name Terminology
